reviewText: It's not won't I thought it would be at all but I have it

Great DVD that was direct to content and was as expected.  The shipping on time, previous reviews just and unbiased.  Price per item always a plus and reasonable.  Quality of viewing content unflawed.

Whore Angels.... What's a great title! My girlfriend is a whore but she is an angle for me. That's why I watched this movie!
Anyway, I really loved this movie. This is not just like a regular soft core sex film. It has a deep theme behind: An angels fights against a demon, but the script writer, Takao Nakano (Big Tits Zombie), made it even funnier.
Also, I really liked one of the evil chicks, Shoko Kudo. She is hot and awesome! I remember she was in Takao Nakano's "Sumo Vixen.'
Director, Mototsugu Watanabe, did a great job! This movie is equivalent to "Sexy Battle Girls!"
Also, I really appreciate Pink Eiga, Inc. They always bring awesome movies  to the U.S. audiences.
You guys are rock!

Pink Eiga! you guys rock. I received my copy of Whore Angels on Friday and loved it! I loved it so much that I had some friends come over and check it out. Some of them thought I was crazy but the rest were on the same boat as me. This movie has everything drama, comedy and lets not for get some great sex scenes! It's not the best shot film but who cares when you have a chick that heals people with sex acts. don't get me started on the villains talk about laughing your but off. you should def check it out if you get a chance.
